text: Arau yisakala te'omlokara pichata ahiche te'omloke kaya, ‘he amara pratipalaka! Amaka arau amara purbe imana posana karaa amara bhatrsakalaka ksama karai diya; arau yisakale imana aniche te'omlokara biraud'dhe amara antarata kono bidbesa naraakhiba. He amara pratipalaka! Niscaya tumi dayabana, parama dayalu’
